item.description:
Northeast Organic Farming Association/Massachusetts 24th Annual Winter Conference
January 15, 2011
Worcester Technical High School
1 Skyline Drive, Worcester
9:00 AM-5:00 PM

Keynote Speaker: Michael Phillips of Heartsong Farm, Groveton, NH.

60 Workshops on Gardening, Farming, Food Preservation, Alternative Energy and More!
Dozens of exhibitors and vendors.
All-day seminars on Organic Apple Orcharding by Michael Phillips and Herbs for Family Health by Nancy Phillips.
Registration $65 with discounts for NOFA members and farmers.
Free-Registration Beginning Farmer Scholarships available for anyone farming 10 years or less.
To register, got to www.nofamass.org or call 978-355-2853, or email wc@nofamass.org.
item.name: Northeast Organic Farming Association 2011 Winter Conference
